productSchema.attribute: The flavor id of the slice.
The number of extra public IPs. Defaults to zero.
The number of extra private IPs. Defaults to zero.
Does the slice use a RedHat license.
Does the slice use an MSSQL license.
Does the slice use an MSSQL Web license.
Does the slice use a Windows license.
Does the slice use an SELinux license.

xpathAssertion.test: if (xsd:boolean(@isRedHat)) then not(xsd:boolean(@isSELinux) or xsd:boolean(@isWindows) or xsd:boolean(@isMSSQL) or xsd:boolean(@isMSSQLWeb)) else true()

productSchema.xpathAssertion: If slice isRedHat then it cannot be SELinux, Windows, MSSQL or MSSQLQWeb.

xpathAssertion.test: if (xsd:boolean(@isSELinux)) then not(xsd:boolean(@isRedHat) or xsd:boolean(@isWindows) or xsd:boolean(@isMSSQL) or xsd:boolean(@isMSSQLWeb)) else true()

productSchema.xpathAssertion: If slice isSELinux then it cannot be RedHat, Windows, MSSQL or MSSQLQWeb.

xpathAssertion.test: if (xsd:boolean(@isWindows)) then not(xsd:boolean(@isRedHat) or xsd:boolean(@isSELinux)) else true()

productSchema.xpathAssertion: If slice isWindows then it cannot be RedHat or SELinux.

xpathAssertion.test: if (xsd:boolean(@isMSSQL)) then xsd:boolean(@isWindows) and not(xsd:boolean(@isMSSQLWeb) or xsd:boolean(@isRedHat) or xsd:boolean(@isSELinux)) else true()

productSchema.xpathAssertion: If slice isMSSQL then it has to be windows, and not RedHat, SELinux or MSSQLWeb.

xpathAssertion.test: if (xsd:boolean(@isMSSQLWeb)) then xsd:boolean(@isWindows) and not(xsd:boolean(@isMSSQL) or xsd:boolean(@isRedHat) or xsd:boolean(@isSELinux)) else true()

productSchema.xpathAssertion: If slice isMSSQLWeb then it has to be windows, and not RedHat, SELinux or MSSQL.
